name: Resident Evil 4: Otome Edition
summary:
Resident Evil 4: Otome Edition is a fan-made visual novel told from Ashley Graham’s perspective, tracing her adventure from kidnapping to crushing hard on Kennedy (and, surprise, some cultists). Using screenshots from the game, plus some original art and UI elements, Ashley narrates the early moments of Resident Evil 4, coloring old experiences in a goofy light. 
 
Download the demo at www.erotome.com or https://erotome.itch.io/re4-otome
